definition: (idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to return something to its rightful owner
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
